text:
"Tiny Toon Adventures", also known as "Steven Spielberg Presents Tiny Toon Adventures", is an American animated comedy sitcom adventure television series. It aired from September 24, 1999 to July 18, 2001. It follows a group of young cartoon characters who attend Acme Looniversity in the town of Acme Acres to become the next generation of "Looney Tunes" characters. The series premiered airs at 7:30 p.m. ET/PT time on September 24, 1999 on Cartoon Network in the United States. then in developed for 2020 as the new spin-off reboot called, Tiny Toon Looniversity by HBO MAX.
International Broadcast.
Chutti TV and Cartoon Network (India)
